blogPost.excerpt: Managing teams is a mess. Tons of files, emails to manage 1:1s, skills, reviews, personal growth, etc. With Vectorly you start with simple 1:1 meetings integrated with your workflow. And eventually grow as manager with tools and insights to deliver results.
blogPost.body: Managing teams is a mess. Tons of files, emails to manage 1:1s, skills, reviews, personal growth, etc. With Vectorly you start with simple 1:1 meetings integrated with your workflow. And eventually grow as manager with tools and insights to deliver results.
blogPost.title: Vectorly 2.0 - Develop high-performing Engineering & Design teams 🚀
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 管理团队是个烂摊子。大量的文件，电子邮件来管理1:1，技能，审查，个人成长等。有了Vectorly，你可以从简单的1:1会议开始，与你的工作流程进行整合。并最终成长为拥有工具和洞察力的经理，以实现结果。
localize.tagline: 培养高绩效的工程和设计团队 🚀。

localize.description: 管理團隊是個爛攤子。大量的文件，電子郵件來管理1:1，技能，審查，個人成長等。有了Vectorly，你可以從簡單的1:1會議開始，與你的工作流程進行整合。並最終成長爲擁有工具和洞察力的經理，以實現結果。
localize.tagline: 培養高績效的工程和設計團隊 🚀。

previous.excerpt: Cadoo is the most intense way to reach your fitness goals. ⠀ Browse challenges, commit to a fitness goal, use a fitness tracker to track your progress. Winners get their money back + extra money from the challenge losers.
previous.title: Cadoo - Your running drill coach that motivates you with money

localize.description: 凯度是达到你健身目标的最紧张的方式。⠀ 浏览挑战，承诺一个健身目标，使用健身跟踪器来跟踪你的进展。赢家可以拿回他们的钱+挑战失败者的额外资金。
localize.tagline: 你的跑操教练，用金钱来激励你。

localize.description: 凱度是達到你健身目標的最緊張的方式。⠀ 瀏覽挑戰，承諾一個健身目標，使用健身跟蹤器來跟蹤你的進展。贏家可以拿回他們的錢+挑戰失敗者的額外資金。
localize.tagline: 你的跑操教練，用金錢來激勵你。

localize.description: 拍照，应用会自动将任何一张脸替换成我的脸。
拍照，應用會自動將任何一張臉替換成我的臉。
